Krhinos: Alright, Rukus. The warp won't be long, so keep an eye out on
the other side. I want to be warned of anything unusual.

He took hold of a metal crate twice his size and moved it in the cargo
hold of the large transport shuttle. The crate contained nothing else
than much of the necessary item to establish a base camp onplanet.

Krhinos: Dracon, get the mining equipment from that corner inside, but
leave the two bombs here.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Jeff" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> --Rukus--
> 
> "Alright Krhinos." He replies, then checks the safe distance from 
> the station, and then turn on his comm again, "Prep for launch. 
> Engines firing..." The engines charged up and being propulsing the 
> ship.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > Krhinos: Please, no countdown. Just engage the drives when we're in
> > range so we can get there and establish a camp as soon as possible.
> > Dracon, meet me in the cargo bay. We'll load a shuttle that we'll 
> send
> > down.
